Name: 麻神消消乐
About the game: This game is an casual game combined with the gameplay of mahjong and tetris. In the middle of the screen of the screen keeps falling the mahjong tiles and will form a hand of tiles. Then it comes the second hand of tiles and it goes the same way for other hands at most 8 hands. If it continues to fall tiles and you don't win with 8 hands of tiles then you fail the whole game. In this process, you can change tiles in your hand with the fell ones to make it for one necessary tile win. When it falls the tile of win, that can remove the tiles at the condition of one necessary to win. At the end of a game, score is counted at the mutiples of the win hand. Refresh the records and the scores of your best hands.
